item.description:
Well...summer is here (almost) and we ALL want to have fun. So, time to start planning for the "good times" to roll. Grab your toothbrush, your suitcase, your flip flops and lets boogie. Whether you long for short weekend jaunts, cruises, tropical beaches, or just a daytrip we can do it!!!

Fellow travelers, our first meetup has been scheduled. We are having a get together, complete with happy hour and appetizers (if you wish). We will get to know each other and do some planning. All you need to do is bring a smile and an idea or two to share as to what you think will work.

We will meet at Westbrook Lobster Restaurant in Wallingford and plan our "getaway". Perhaps a new travel buddy, or buddies, is in the wind. Let's ride it together...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on our FUN table!!!
item.name: Get Acquainted Brainstorming Session...Where Do You Want To Go???
